paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for TTR gene, including penetrance data for affected and unaffected carriers.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Diagnosed with acute heart failure, no additional symptoms noticed.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The first patient (TTR V20I) is a man who was diagnosed at the age of 56.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Suffered from carpal tunnel syndrome and severe cardiomyopathy.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The second patient is a woman (TTR G47E) who was diagnosed at the age of 56 years.

individual_records.phenotype_details: Showed carpal tunnel syndrome and received a heart transplantation.
individual_records.evidence_sentence: The third patient is a man (TTR V122I) who was diagnosed at the age of 51 years.

functional_data.summary: The mutations do not necessarily lead to different fibril morphologies.

variants.segregation_data: The mutations segregate with disease in the affected patients.
variants.additional_notes: All patients expressed both mutant and wild type TTR.
key_quotes: The patients varied also in the exact clinical and pathological disease manifestations, although all patients showed severe cardiomyopathy.
None of the patients received anti-amyloid medication until heart transplantation.

extraction_metadata.notes: All relevant data extracted from the main text.
